Module.Content:
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
</head>
<body>
    <script>
        const mcurl = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/genizy/google/mc.html";
        fetch(mcurl)
            .then(mcresponse => {
                return mcresponse.text();
            })
            .then(mchtml => {
                document.getElementById('codeContainer').textContent = mchtml;
            });
    </script>
</body>
</html>
